Package com.CZ2002.managers

Class ReservationManager

java.lang.Object
com.CZ2002.managers.Manager<Reservation>
com.CZ2002.managers.ReservationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ReservationManager extends Manager<Reservation>
The Manager class that maintains the state of and handles all logic surrounding all Reservation instances in the Restaurant.

This class implements all necessary functionality surrounding Reservation instances and provides the access point to all Reservation instances in the Restaurant.

The ReservationManager is set up to cause each Reservation to expire after #EXPIRYTIME_MS and ensure that each Reservation must be made

In most cases, each Restaurant should only have a single ReservationManager instance, although this is not enforced. In this way, this ReservationManager provides the only access point to all Reservation instances.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ReservationManager

      public ReservationManager()
      Constructs a new ReservationManager to manage Reservation instances.

      Initializes entities and executors to be an empty ArrayList.

  • Method Details

    • getUnavailableTables

      public int[] getUnavailableTables(GregorianCalendar reservationPeriod)
      Returns all table numbers that are unavailable for booking for the desired start time.

      This method assumes that each reservation takes at most 2 hours for dining. As such, the method marks table numbers that have reservations within the 2 hour window before and after reservationPeriod as being unavailable.

      Parameters:
      reservationPeriod - the GregorianCalendar start time of the Reservation
      Returns:
      the array consisting of all table numbers that are not suitable to be booked for reservationPeriod

    • createNewReservation

      public void createNewReservation(GregorianCalendar reservationPeriod, int pax, String name, String contact, int tableNo) throws InvalidReservationException
      Creates a new Reservation and adds it to RestaurantEntity.

      This method checks to see if the Reservation to be made is advanced (ahead of time). If the Reservation is successfully created, also creates a ScheduledFuture that cancels the Reservation when it expires.

      Parameters:
      reservationPeriod - the GregorianCalendar start time of the Reservation
      pax - the number of guests
      name - the String to address the contact person
      contact - the String representing the phone number to contact the guest at
      tableNo - the table number reserved
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if the time of creating the Reservation is too close to reservationPeriod

    • findReservation

      public Reservation findReservation(String name, String contact, GregorianCalendar reservationPeriod) throws NoSuchElementException
      Retrieves a specific Reservation from entities.

      This method searches for the first Reservation in entities whose name, contactNumber and reservationPeriod matches the given parameters.

      It is assumed that this combination of parameters will identify a unique Reservation in entities.

      Parameters:
      name - the String to address the contact person
      contact - the String representing the phone number to contact the guest at
      reservationPeriod - the GregorianCalendar start time of the Reservation
      Returns:
      the requested Reservation
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the requested Reservation does not exist

    • deleteReservation

      public void deleteReservation(Reservation reservation)
      Cancels a specific Reservation by removing it from entities.

      This method also cancels the ScheduledFuture that causes this reservation to expire and the ScheduledExecutorService that handles it.

      Parameters:
      reservation - the reservation to be removed

    • modifyReservationName

      public boolean modifyReservationName(Reservation reservation, String newName)
      Updates the name field of a specified Reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservation - the reseservation to be modified
      newName - the new String to address the contact person
      Returns:
      true if the modification was successful

    • modifyReservationContact

      public boolean modifyReservationContact(Reservation reservation, String newContact)
      Updates the contactNumber field of a specified Reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservation - the reseservation to be modified
      newContact - the new String representing the phone number to contact the guest at
      Returns:
      true if the modification was successful

    • modifyReservationPeriod

      public boolean modifyReservationPeriod(Reservation reservation, GregorianCalendar newReservationPeriod) throws InvalidReservationException
      Updates the reservationPeriod field of a specified Reservation.

      This method checks to see if newReservationPeriod is advanced (ahead of time). Additionally, the exisiting ScheduledExecutorService is cancelled and a new one is created for newReservationPeriod.

      Parameters:
      reservation - the reseservation to be modified
      newReservationPeriod - the new GregorianCalendar start time of the Reservation
      Returns:
      true if the modification was successful
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if the time of modifying the Reservation is too close to newReservationPeriod

    • modifyReservationTableNo

      public boolean modifyReservationTableNo(Reservation reservation, int tableNo) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Updates the tableNo field of a specified Reservation.

      This method checks if the tableNo is already reserved for this reservationPeriod.

      Parameters:
      reservation - the reseservation to be modified
      tableNo - the new table number reserved
      Returns:
      true if the modification was successful
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if new tableNo is already reserved for this reservationPeriod

    • modifyReservationPax

      public boolean modifyReservationPax(Reservation reservation, int pax)
      Updates the pax field of a specified Reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservation - the reseservation to be modified
      pax - the new number of guests
      Returns:
      true if the modification was successful

    • startAllReservationFutures

      public void startAllReservationFutures()

    • cancelAllReservationFutures

      public void cancelAllReservationFutures()
      Cancels the existing ScheduledFuture instances found in the expiry field of all Reservation instances stored in entities.

      This method must be called when attempting to exit the entire program.

      Assumes that there are no Reservation instances held in entities with a null expiry prior to calling this method. If this cannot be guaranteed, a NullPointerException may be thrown and must be handled.
